Table of Contents

Name

gluNewNurbsRenderer - create a NURBS object

C Specification

GLUnurbs* gluNewNurbsRenderer( void ) 


 eqn not supported


Description

gluNewNurbsRenderer creates and returns a
pointer to a new NURBS object. This object must be referred to when calling
NURBS rendering and control functions. A return value of 0 means that there
is not enough memory to allocate the object. 

See Also

gluBeginCurve(3G)
,
gluBeginSurface(3G)
, gluBeginTrim(3G)
, gluDeleteNurbsRenderer(3G)
, gluNurbsCallback(3G)
,
gluNurbsProperty(3G)
